entry.title: Hello World你好
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: myblog
date: 2023-03-23 23:14:04

看网上都是说改config.xml, 但讲真的，1没说清楚，2没给路径，而且大多都是复制粘贴别人的，就自己头铁试试吧，写这个坑的日期是在2021.11.12，nodejs 版本v10.19.0，系统是Ubuntu 20.04
先说路径，是自己初始化博客的那个文件夹，下的_config.yml
highlight:
enable: false #就只有这一句，true改成false，就结束了
line_number: true
auto_detect: false
tab_replace: ‘’
wrap: true
hljs: false
